issue.title: [Go] Defer should not be used in the loop
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9850](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9850). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As is described in the second section in <https://blog.learngoprogramming.com/gotchas-of-defer-in-go-1-8d070894cb01>

 

defer inside the loop may cause unforeseen problems.
